loot_table.name: Afanc
loot_table.description: A mythical creature often depicted as a demon crocodile.

loot_table.name: Ascallion
loot_table.description: A fierce sea creature, known for its hard shell and sharp teeth.

loot_table.name: Barbfish
loot_table.description: A species of freshwater bottom-feeder shark from Amn.

loot_table.name: Bichir
loot_table.description: A species of fish known for its elongated body and large scales.

loot_table.name: Black Burner
loot_table.description: A fiery fish emitting dark smoke, usually found in volcanic underwater vents.

loot_table.name: Bloatfish
loot_table.description: A fish that inflates its body when threatened.

loot_table.name: Brownfin
loot_table.description: A species of freshwater fish found in Cormyr and the King's Forest.

loot_table.name: Giant Catfish
loot_table.description: A larger version of the common catfish, often found in deep rivers.

loot_table.name: Stalking Catfish
loot_table.description: A silent hunter of the underwater world, known for its stealth.

loot_table.name: Crystal Nipper
loot_table.description: A small, translucent fish known for its powerful bite.

loot_table.name: Dunchow
loot_table.description: A delicacy in Amn only found in Lake Esmel.

loot_table.name: Icetail
loot_table.description: A fish adapted to cold environments, with a tail resembling a shard of ice.

loot_table.name: Jewelfish
loot_table.description: A beautifully colored fish prized by collectors.

loot_table.name: Hetfish
loot_table.description: Swarming fish known for their super-heated bodies that turn water into steam.

loot_table.name: Hogfish
loot_table.description: A species of fish found in Akanamere, often dried and stocked in pantries of the city-state of Sumbria.

loot_table.name: Manyfins
loot_table.description: A fish with an unusually large number of fins, creating a unique silhouette in the water.

loot_table.name: Pike
loot_table.description: A species of big and energetic freshwater predators.

loot_table.name: Northern Pike
loot_table.description: A species of big and energetic cold brackish water-dwelling cousins from the Sea of Moving Ice.

loot_table.name: Piranha
loot_table.description: Small schooling predators that go into blood frenzy and swarm their prey.

loot_table.name: Pyrimo
loot_table.description: A fish species that is well-adapted to high-temperature environments.

loot_table.name: Quippers
loot_table.description: Small, carnivorous fish, often moving in large schools.

loot_table.name: Greater Raiks
loot_table.description: Species of aggressive fish with hooked jaws found in the waters of Sea of Fallen Stars.

loot_table.name: Lesser Raiks
loot_table.description: Smaller subspecies of Raiks, equally aggressive but not as threatening.

loot_table.name: S'repic
loot_table.description: A flesh-eating fish from the Malatran Plateau with huge silver scales.

loot_table.name: Salmon
loot_table.description: A common fish species, well-regarded for its taste.

loot_table.name: Sardine
loot_table.description: Small silver fish often found in large schools.

loot_table.name: Silverling
loot_table.description: Small, silver-colored fish that are quite common in rivers and lakes.

loot_table.name: Singing Fish
loot_table.description: Fancifully-cooked festival fish from the Blade Kingdoms, caught in the waters of Akanamere.

loot_table.name: Sharks
loot_table.description: Predatory sea creatures, known for their strength and aggressive nature.

loot_table.name: Giant Sharks
loot_table.description: Huge, highly dangerous predators of the open sea.

loot_table.name: Spiny Sleeper
loot_table.description: A nocturnal fish that has sharp spines along its body.

loot_table.name: Steelhead
loot_table.description: A variant of the trout, known for its hard head and strong bite.

loot_table.name: Sunfish
loot_table.description: Several species of fresh and saltwater fish known for their flat, round bodies.

loot_table.name: Knucklehead Trout
loot_table.description: A variant of trout with a distinctive 'knuckle'-like head shape.

loot_table.name: Szorp Trout
loot_table.description: A rare trout species, known for its poisonous spines.

loot_table.name: Verme
loot_table.description: A small, colorful fish found in coral reefs.
